attributes.action: Enable the use of Safe Homes in every town for refuge of children being abused!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Three homes in every town are needed to fulfil what we believe is an essential part of our growth and knowledge in combatting child abuse. We need every council in the UK to facilitate properties that can be used by our teams for this purpose. It is an option that should eradicate child incest/abuse as each child will be admitted to us immediately, or admit themselves, until investigations are complete. If nothing untoward is found, the children can go home upon conclusion.
It makes sense in 2010 to update our inadequate systems to concentrate on the rapid rise in child abuse. To that end, I give you my petition for Safe Homes For Abused Children UK/Global
